content.prompt: Which of the following best explains why the advertiser attempted to portray the washing machine in the manner shown in the image?

choices.label: It wished to convince French women that labor-saving devices would make their lives easier.
It wanted to convince French women that capitalism was a better economic system than communism.
It wished to convince French women that they no longer needed marriage or families in their lives.
It wanted to convince French men that they should help their wives with work in the household.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
